com.io7m.r1.kernel.types

Interface KShadowMapDescriptionBuilderType

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    KShadowMapDescriptionBasicBuilderType, KShadowMapDescriptionVarianceBuilderType

    public interface KShadowMapDescriptionBuilderType
    The common functions shared by directional and omnidirectional shadow map builders.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      Set the depth precision for the map

      Set the size exponent for the map.

      • setSizeExponent

        void setSizeExponent(int n)
        Set the size exponent for the map. The resulting map will be (2ⁿ * 2ⁿ) texels.
        Parameters:
        n - The exponent
